# Powers of 2

links: [[themes/000 Index|Index]]

---

| Exponent | Result        |
| -------- | ------------- |
| 0        | 1             |
| 1        | 2             |
| 2        | 4             |
| 3        | 8             |
| 4        | 16            |
| 5        | 32            |
| 6        | 64            |
| 7        | 128           |
| 8        | 256           |
| 9        | 512           |
| 10       | 1024          |
| 11       | 2048          |
| 12       | 4096          |
| 13       | 8192          |
| 14       | 16384         |
| 15       | 32768         |
| 16       | 65536         |
| 17       | 131072        |
| 18       | 262144        |
| 19       | 524288        |
| 20       | 1'048'576     |
| 32       | 4'294'967'296 |
| 64       | 1.84 * 10^19  |
| 128      | 3.4 * 10^38   |
| 256      | 1.16 * 10^77  |
| 512      | 1.34 * 10^154 |
